document_name: Support to Implementation of Resultant National Processes from the Kenya National Dialogue and Reconciliation

outputs.output_descr: UNDP Kenya and the Government of Kenya through the Ministry of Justice, National Cohesion and Constitutional Affairs(MoJNCCA) initiated the Support to the Implementation of Resultant National Process from the Kenya National Dialogue and Reconsilliation(KNDR) process. The overall aim of the project is to support the implementation of constitutional, legal and institutional reforms; truth, justice and reconcilliation; national cohesion and integration and any other reforms agreed upon under the KNDR agreement brokered by the Panel of African Eminent Personalities chaired by H.E Dr. Kofi Annan. This was after after the first phase achieved its objective of promalgating a new Constitution.

project_descr: Support to implementation of resultant national processes from the Kenya National Dialogue and Reconciliation (KNDR) process by the Ministry of Justice, National Cohesion and Constitutional Affairs(MoJNCCA)
